name: Give A Soul
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam of 2023 with the theme : An End is a new Beginning 

GOAL :

You have to build your successor piece by piece before you die.

Collect PARTS one by one and THROW THEM AROUND to your DESK to build him.

You will die and give your soul to his body so you can keep on living for as long as possible.

There are 8 types of levels, full of traps for you to die a lot!

Have fun but keep in mind this game is HARD, so be prepared!

CONTROLS

WASD  /  Arrow Keys : Move (Arrow keys recommended)

Space : Pick Up / Throw a PART.

Escape : Open Pause Menu
